original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2586)@</color>凝氣化劍罡，向前跳躍之後重擊地面，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2586)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2586)@</color> Condensing Qi into Jian Gang, jump forward and then hit the ground hard to <color=# ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2586)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
